name: Gorirat

aura.name: full-power_gorilla_mode
aura.description: When activated, unleashes a primal fury that increases Gorirat's attack power.

description: It beats the ground rhythmically to communicate with its comrades. The meaning of each rhythm differs by troop, but the distinction between them is still largely unknown.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: ground_pound
skills.description: Gorilla's exclusive skill. Pounds the ground twice before leaping into the air and unleashing a powerful punch.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: seed_machine_gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
